title: Atmosphir 1 0 BETA
description:
Atmosphir is a free video game / creation tool for Mac & PC. Design mode lets you create enormous 3D platforming levels filled with fun gameplay elements like power-ups and fireballs, while Play mode lets you explore through the thousands of diverse user-created challenges being uploaded every day. 

Atmosphir is currently in a private beta, with a worldwide release scheduled before the end of the year. So please sign up for the Beta, and make sure to subscribe (via rss or iTunes) to our video feed for future updates. Thanks for your interest!

Min Sys Specs: 

WINDOWS 
Windows XP 
Amd or Intel compatible processor, 1.4ghz 
512 mb of ram 
Gforce fx5200 64mb of ram 
500mb of hard drive space 
Latest drivers for peripherals installed 
Internet connection 

MAC 
OSX Tiger 10.4 
Intel core duo, 1.66mhz 
512 mb of ram 
Intel 950 graphics accelerator 
500mb of hard drive space 
Internet connection 

LINUX 
SDL 1.2.x installed 
Amd or Intel compatible processor, 1.4ghz 
512 mb of ram 
Gforce fx5200 64mb of ram 
500mb of hard drive space 
Latest drivers for peripherals installed 
Internet connection
